name: Kay Willis
text: Extremely friendly staff! This is my favorite Pizza Plus location and we live in Surgoinsville.

name: Reda Yankee
text: Good place to eat, at lunch they serve a hot bar and it is really good. Also, their salad bar is fresh and is served with the hot bar.

name: Jami Sharrow
text: This is by far our favorite pizza place in the Kingsport area. We liked it so much we ate here twice in one week. They offer delicious variety of pizzas and crust, their prices are pretty good compared to other pizza places in the area. And they are pretty fast which is always helpful. We highly recommend the chicken fajita Pizza!

name: Blake Ford
text: Best pizza in town. Salad bar is great too

name: Jeffrey Smith
text: Buffet pizza. We have all eaten it. Sometimes it is good, sometimes not. No one expects a gourmet meal at Pizza Plus. But what you should be able to expect is fresh pizza for every customer. Old heat lamp pizza is just not appetizing. It is fast and fills the belly but surely not what I want.

name: Charles Hyder
text: My favorite pizza brand in Kingsport‚ù§Ô∏èüçï

name: ThatCarHornGuy2
text: Amazing food, lots of entertainment for your kids in the back (claw machines, etc.) Very kind employees, just an overall great place to eat.

name: Andy Bowlin
text: I always ask for well done and I may get it 2 out of 5 times. I wish they were more consistent with their pizza. One day it will be wonderful and next time it just sucks

name: Real Life Moms by Laura Hurd
text: My two boys and I went to eat here for lunch. They have an awesome and affordable lunch buffet! We got there a little before noon and we were pleasantly surprised that there was fresh pizza and a pristine salad bar. They have one of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Teresea Wells
text: Excellent customer service.  Good food.

name: Steve Alley
text: Food and service was excellent. Great price on the Monday deal. Dinning room and restrooms were exceptionally clean. If you haven't tried Pizza Plus in awhile I encourage you to give them a try. Tell them Steve sent you!

name: Tish Cumbow
text: They are way better than our local pizza hut by a landslide! Friendly atmosphere. Always on top of stocking buffet. Waiters/waitresses are great and friendly and always on top of refilling your drink or any other need you might have!

name: Gary Thompson
text: Excellent food but not good value for the money

name: Vicki Mack
text: Great people, great pizza with REAL cheese. Love the drive thru when I'm in a hurry.

name: Nichole Goins
text: Its always tge way i like it and ask them to do

name: Michelle Holder
text: Great service! We reserved the party room. No fee to use. Great prices on food! They do clean up.

name: Tim Branson
text: Good lunch. Good service and fair price.

name: Leona Bordwine
text: Always use pick up... Good food

name: Roger Arnold
text: Good food nice people

name: Johnny Castle
text: We went for the bar like we do every Wednesday for the past 4 years and there were no pizzas and my wife kindly asked the new manager, Maria, if they could make some for the bar and she rudely told my wife, " there are pizzas out there" and ‚Ä¶More

name: Dylan Sexton
text: Worst pizza plus in the area and it's not close. Delivery drivers routinely forget items. They are also extremely slow. I just waited over an hour for a pizza on a Monday. Dine in may be better, but for delivery look elsewhere

name: Tyler Parkhill
text: The pizza here is to die for. It's amazing. I would definitely recommend. Last time I visited, some things  on the salad bar weren't  exactly fresh, but nothing major to make me stop visiting. Planning to eat here again in the near future.

name: skyla burchell
text: I was suppose to have bacon chedder fries and they gave me plain fries and raw onions on my sandwich which was suppose to be cooked. You really need a night shift staff that cares about costumer serviceüò†üò†üò†

name: Lawrence Womack
text: Me and a friend went there 45 minutes before closing told us we could not sit there they have closed the inside closed everything down if you're closed won't you put the closed sign up very disappointing

name: jay dub
text: The night crew does know how to listen. I ordered a delivery order at 8:30pm. At 9:36pm i called back asking about my order and they told me it was ready. I asked why is was not delivered and the responce of the mgr was, "your food has been ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelsey Marsh
text: Usually pretty good food. Only bad thing is you never know how much you will pay week to week for the same thing.

name: Susan LINKOUS
text: I really enjoy the buffet and the people are always polite and helpful!

name: Linda Nilsson
text: Lots of pizza & salads...good food at a good price.

name: Gloria Mcdavid
text: Good pizza, as always!

name: Dennis Kinzer
text: Very clean.  The lunch buffet was very fresh and delicious.  Couldn't ask for more friendly staff.

name: Terry Kirkpatrick
text: Great food curtious service

name: Joe White
text: Best pizza in the area by far

name: dwight berry
text: The service is great and the food is better than any pizza place I know.

name: Craig Helton
text: This is a good place to eat ate

name: Joshua Gibson
text: Its amazing

name: STEPHEN HAMMER
text: Sometimes I have to refill my own drink, which is fine, but I like my waiters to be on top of their guests. Pizza is good.

name: Todd Davenport
text: Pizza is good. But the price is ridiculous. Too high, so the value isn't good.

name: Pat Fink
text: Food was great.  Love the salad bar.  Not enough servers to refill drinks.

name: Zach Chandler
text: Good as always. Salad bar has always been one of my favorite.

name: Michael Walker
text: Top notch service!  Our team went for a lunch after the local parade and the team at Pizza Plus in Church Hill knocked it out of the park!

name: Eldon Clark
text: Convenient and friendly

name: Duane Jobe
text: Best taco pizza ever

name: Mom Zac
text: Outstanding pizza - its like Pizza Hut of the 70s , before they went all chunky.  Totally recommend!!!!

name: Chris Andies
text: Great salad bar and pizza buffet.

name: Brandi Leann
text: Great place too eat good cheese sticks and salads

name: Sonya Hall
text: Awesome! BBQ chicken pizza, salad and meat lovers

name: Zane Marshall
text: Not the best Americanized pizza option around, but it's better than some! Definitely leaps and bounds better than Pizza Hut.

name: Gene Williams
text: Always good. Good deals too

name: Becca Kern
text: Only had delivery from this place and it was always pretty good

name: Mike Byrd
text: Buffet is good price and good food. Selection can be limited at times depending on the crowd.

name: Larry Craddock
text: Our local favorite

name: I am
text: The pizza is pretty good

name: Lydia Brock-West
text: They have great food and good service!

name: Lone Wolf
text: Great pizza

name: Jessica Templeton
text: Good food

name: Jill Mashburn
text: They give you the wrong pizza then won't refund your money, so look at it before you pay or plan on waiting another 25 minutes

name: Carrie Coleman
text: Make food fresh by request

name: Jeff Mayes
text: Nice place to eat

name: Donald Hill
text: Good food

text: Great pizza

text: Great pizza

name: Lisa Ramey
text: Love pizza

name: Debbie Stapleton
text: Serve

name: Ron Dowdy
text: Great place for lunch and dinner.

name: Sharon Whittemore
text: Closest pizza joint. I haven't been to this place in 6mos. I bake at home.

name: PineRidge Homestead
text: Poor service.  I love pizza plus but the staff is horrible.

name: Ronald Ward
text: good food

name: Natasha Christie
text: Delicious. Always good food

name: Rita DeBord
text: Good food

name: Joshua Russell
text: Grew up on this pizza. Miss the 2-4-1 carryout deals they used to have. Don't eat there as much anymore due to that.

name: I thank god that I'm not you
